reviewText: My kids and I love watching Clarence. I wish they had more available on DVD.
My son loves Clarence. Its a cartoon that I can even sit and watch
I love this show. So does my 5-year-old boy. It's hilarious!
My nephew loved these movies.  I got these for his birthday.
Wonderful cartoon for children and adults
I LOVE IT SO MUCH AND IT'S THE BEST
Husband loves his gift!  Clarence DVD has great episodes and is hilarious!
My Son and I laugh so hard watching this. Want more Clarence movies....
It was exactly what I expected
We enjoy it as a family
Hilarious cartoon. Worth your money for a couple of hours of entertainment in the car ride.
This is a great follow up to Clarence - Mystery Pinata.  Definitely a great reminder of when I was a young'un.  Ohh...to be a kid again.
Good show. I can watch this show with my son and legitimately enjoy it.
My kids and I love this show!
